author: swertz
body:
#### PR description:

This is the correspondence of https://github.com/cms-nanoAOD/cmssw/pull/479 but for electrons.

The sign in miniAOD was fixed in #28753 for muons and #30738 for electrons. This PR fixes the sign at nanoAOD level when running on existing miniAOD, where the fix is not present yet.

Will need a backport to 106X.

Closes https://github.com/cms-nanoAOD/cmssw/issues/514

#### PR validation:

Validated by processing 2000 ttbar events on RunIISummer16MiniAODv3 (with `auto:run2_mc` and `Run2_2016,run2_nanoAOD_94X2016`) and RunIIAutumn18MiniAOD (with `auto:phase1_2018_realistic` and `Run2_2018,run2_nanoAOD_102Xv1`): the only electron variable that shows any change is `dxy`, and as expected only the sign changes:

![Electron_dxy_18](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8058274/93480938-4e769f80-f8fe-11ea-8b9d-c32ce8de1fc1.png)
title: nanoAOD: fix electron IP sign
